title: TNW Answers • Ask TNW's founders ANYTHING about our Financial Times deal
text:
Patrick de Laive Founder TNW - Meet me at https://tnw.to/conference

Boris @ TNW CEO & Co-founder of http://thenextweb.com.Only 47% of what I say here is true or serious.#AMA #TNWLife

By now, you might have heard the news that TNW has been acquired by the — and we don’t use this word lightly — venerable Financial Times. For us, it’s an honor and a tremendous vote of confidence in our business. Our co-founders, Boris and Patrick, are excited to talk about it.



You could ask them about the deal. You could ask them about what this means for the future of TNW. You could also ask them what their favorite cocktail is, or if either of them wears socks while they sleep. Up to you.
